definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
to look at/to watch/to observe/to behold/to advise/concept/point of view/outlook

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我们的价值观和民主权力而言，诸如此类都是如此。

sentences.english: The correct direction of cultural value for collegians should be highlighted in current college education.
sentences.chinese: 当前的大学教育应该注意正确的文化价值观念的引导。

sentences.english: Hu Shi's value system of scientific education was characterized by pure science.
sentences.chinese: 胡适的科学教育价值观是以惟科学主义为特征的。

sentences.english: That "harmony is what matters" is a radical concept in Chinese traditional culture.
sentences.chinese: 和为贵“是中国传统文化的根本价值观。”

sentences.english: All of these values were negated.
sentences.chinese: 所有的那些价值观都被否定。

sentences.english: Culinarily , sashimi represents the Japanese cultural appreciation of subtlety.
sentences.chinese: 从烹饪上说，生鱼片代表了日本的精明文化价值观。

sentences.english: At its core, minimalism is about identifying and embracing our individual values.
sentences.chinese: 其核心是关于识别和拥抱我们每一个人的价值观。

sentences.english: The New Environment Value Theory--Ecology Civilization Value View;
sentences.chinese: 这才是我们所需的新价值观。

sentences.english: A poster with the core values of contemporary revolutionary soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 这是印发部队的当代革命军人核心价值观宣传画。

sentences.english: In that event, their values are not alike.
sentences.chinese: 在那种情况下，他们的价值观并不相同。

sentences.english: STSE education on attitudes and values education, the impact of a difference.
sentences.chinese: STSE教育对态度与价值观教育的影响有差别。

sentences.english: AT YOUR SERVICE is the core value of Club Kopin ever and forever.
sentences.chinese: 为您服务永远是酷品公司秉持的核心价值观。

sentences.english: Those are Asian values to which Banyan will happily subscribe
sentences.chinese: 这些都是榕树乐于赞同亚洲的价值观。

sentences.english: Society has been disoriented by changing values.
sentences.chinese: 变化的价值观使社会感到无所适从。

sentences.english: Conservative politicians in particular like to natter on about family values.
sentences.chinese: 保守派的政客们尤其喜欢对家庭价值观谈个不休。

sentences.english: But are these values unique to America?
sentences.chinese: 但这些价值观是美国独有的吗？

definition: precepts regarding what is honorable and what is shameful (in particular, refers to the Socialist Concepts on Honors and Disgraces, PRC official moral principles promulgated from 2006)/abbr. for 社會主義榮辱觀|社会主义荣辱观/also known as the Eight Honors and Eight Shames 八榮八恥|八荣八耻[Ba1 Rong2 Ba1 Chi3]
to seek common ground, putting differences aside (idiom)
methodology/Discours de la méthode by René Descartes 笛卡兒|笛卡儿[Di2 ka3 er2], 1637
